articles.title: Will plaintiff Terry Sanderson have to pay for Gwyneth Paltrow's legal fees? - CBS News
articles.description: Retired optometrist could be on the hook for up to $1 million — more than triple what he sued the actress for.
articles.content:
Terry Sanderson could be on the hook for covering actress and businesswoman Gwyneth Paltrow's legal fees after she prevailed against him in a court battle over a 2016 skiing accident.
